topic.topicDialog:
Lessons are brilliant for front of class teaching as it means you don't have to locate each resource in the library; they will all be together on one screen.

The lesson can then be assigned to students for revision or as a catch-up tool for those who may have missed a class.

step.stepTextTip: Once logged into Kerboodle, access the course from which you'd like to create the Lesson.
Click on the Create a new lesson button.
Enter a Name and Description for your Lesson.
Use the '+' icon to expand Chapter and Topic folders, and then select the resources you'd like to include in the Lesson.

Close the My Course section to add resources from the My Resources section.

Click OK to create the Lesson.
Your lesson will then appear in the Lessons section.
